column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:  9 sex workers were sent to the Department of Social Affairs. The Police Inspectorate of Daun Penh on July 7 2019
column4: at 8 pm began an operation targeting  cases of street prostitution and crime on Streets 92. 94. 96 and around the roundabout.------By 2:00 am on July 8
column6: 9 people had been taken off the streets; 3 ladyboys and 6 females.------The sex workers and were sent to the Department of Social Welfare in Phnom Penh and the operations will continue to be carried out.
